aircraft.value: Titan Heavy - AC-8291-140 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Flight control cable fraying detected. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 21/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 24/08/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 26/08/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 28/08/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 26/08/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
